item.title: Position: Research Assistant – at School of Design, Southern University of Science and Technology （SUSTech）
item.description: Position Research Assistant – at School of Design, Southern University of Science and Technology （SUSTech） Dr. Wanlin ZHANG is Assistant Professor of Design at School of Design, Southern University of Science and Technology. She is a cross-disciplinary design researcher whose work focuses on design for sustainability, socially responsible design, and culturally significant designs. She holds a PhD in Design from Lancaster University, UK, and MA degree in Design Science from Hunan University, China, and BA in Industrial Design from Central South University, China.
